name: Pumpkin Praline Tart
description: A butter tart shell with a light pumpkin filling garnished with pecan praline and  fresh whipped cream.

name: All American Chocolate Cake
description: Dark chocolate cake layers filled with rich ganache, finished witha chocolate buttercream.

name: Carrot Cake
description: A moist carrot cake made with coconut, walnuts, carrots, pineapple, and finished with a cream cheese frosting.

name: Chocolate Mousse Cake
description: Dark chocolate mousse on a buttery chocolate crust topped with whipped cream.

name: Lemon Mousse Cake
description: A light chiffon cake brushed with lemon syrup, layered with lemon mousse, and finished with a lemon buttercream.

name: Old Fashioned Coconut Cake
description: A gluten free cake made with coconut and almond flour. Filled and frosted with a coconut cream cheese frosting.

name: Tiramisu
description: Light sponge layers brushed with espresso rum syrup and layered with creamy mascarpone and unsweetened cocoa. Finished with a coffee buttercream.

name: Torta Di Cioccolata
description: A smooth flourless chocolate torte made with French chocolate and a hint of almond butter. Garnished with fresh raspberries. Comes with a side of fresh whipped cream & raspberry sauce.

name: Mini Chocolate Pound Cake
description: Moist chocolate pound cake brushed with espresso and covered in a rich dark chocolate ganache. Comes with a side of whipped cream.

name: Butterscotch Crumb Cake
description: Best served warm. Comes with a side of whipped cream. Available after 10am

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
description: Chocolate brownie iced in chocolate ganache.

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Brownie
description: A chocolate brownie, topped with both a layer of peanut butter and chocolate ganache, then finished with chopped peanuts. A peanut butter loverâ€™s dream!
